body.name: First Botany, ALL Natural Body Wash, Fights Body Odor, Athlete's Foot, Jock Itch, Dandruff, Acne, Eczema, Shower Gel for Women & Men, Skin Cleanser -16 fl oz (Tea Tree, Lemon Grass, Clary Sage)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 16 hrs 16 mins
features: EXTRA STRENGTH EXFOLIATING & CLEANSING BODY WASH - Our Tea Tree Lemongrass Clary sage Oil Shower Gel contains high concentration of tea tree oil and Lemon grass Oil making it effective as an full body wash. The lemony, earthy scent of lemongrass essential oil uplifts your spirit. A touch of sweet-herbaceous clary sage essential oil adds balance.
MOISTURIZING SHOWER WASH FOR MEN AND WOMEN – Helps in soothing the irritated skin and wash away the impurities & the dirt. This is our great choice for use as a mens body wash or womens body wash.
EFFECTIVE CLINICALLY PROVEN INGREDIENTS: The Foot and Body Wash helps wash away and defend impurities from the skin surface responsible for body odor, athletes foot, jock itch, acne, t

PLANT-BASED MOISTURIZER & SKIN CLEANSER: Naturally-derived cleaner and skin-natural nutrients, creamy body wash is gentle, so you’ll get beautifully nourished while maintaining healthy skin. Gently cleanses skin while invigorating the senses with the uplifting and energizing scent of Lemongrass. Clary sage and Aloe help soothe skin leaving it smooth and soft.

GREAT FOR ACTIVE PEOPLE – Our shower gel is great for Athletes who are active in sports or workout regularly at the gym. Our Tea Tree Liquid Soap / Daily shower soap is made using the Highest Quality Ingredients. It does not contain alcohol, parabens or sulfates and is Cruelty Free. Made in USA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: all natural for sensitive skin moisturizing, the complaints about the smell are so stupid. its tea tree soap so it smells like tea tree !!! and the complaints of a low lather are also stupid its an oil based soap for moisturizing look at the ingredients !! do you want moisturized skin or a lather pick one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite body wash, bottle is big so you get your moneys worth
reviews.reviewText: This is my new favorite body wash and it actually works as a shampoo too! The bottle is way bigger in person then it looks on the Amazon page. Its never left my skin super moist but it does not leave it dry either. I've never found a body wash that truly moisturizes my skin. Just put lotion on after you shower. That's what everyone else is doing anyways, lol. Or take a bath with vitamin E oil in it. I live in Tucson, AZ . and I can vouch that it works. This bottle wash comes in a huge body, so you get your moneys worth. Just a small amount will make you smell great but not like perfume. Its smells clean, natural, herbal, and light. The lemongrass is wonderful, the tea tree oil smells clean and is also an antibacterial. The body wash also includes clary sage. the combination of all three not only kills all bacteria on your body, but leaves you smelling naturally clean but not overpowering. Its my favority from now on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars What you would expect from the ingredients listed
reviews.reviewText: It did what I wanted, good on my skin. But I would have liked a better accent. At the same time I wasn't expecting the best scent because of the ingredients but it wasn't bad. It did what I wanted and was a good daily shower wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m torn on this product. The smell out of the bottle is not great. Like wood and potting soil mixed together. That said, I’ve noticed that the initial scent doesn’t seem to linger very long and the body odor I’m trying to get rid of is greatly reduced for the day. So…it works if you can get past the initial scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells great and the man approved it. Says he really liked the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets the funk out
reviews.reviewText: I love this body wash. For the bigger gals - you know hot summer days, post workout, night sweats …. It can get fuuunky. This product makes you feel fresh and clean. My husband loves it too. I’m sure that all the people around us like it too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Benefit not worth the smell
reviews.reviewText: This stuff smells terrible, I try holding my breath even. I love the scents in essential oils but this stuff smells like old wet grass not really good on the body or a closed in shower. I would not suggest this to anyone you like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I really like this body wash. I feel very clean after I use it.
reviews.reviewText: Smells good. Leaves skin feeling clean and refreshed. I have bought this twice now, and will definitely buy again.
